title: Copra (Compendium V1 + V2, Issues 07-11, 2013)
description: Copra by Michel Fiffe was one of the best comics of 2013, and was praised over and over for the art and writing. The torrent collects Copra Compendium Volume 1 (Issues #1-3), Copra Compendium Volume 2 (Issues #4-6), and individual issues #7-11. All that's missing from the first major arc is issue 12, which I think has been released but I could not find it. Otherwise, it's everything you need to get started! Check out any review or the author's website for more info, but I doubt you'll be disappointed. Enjoy and please seed! :-)
